attributes.action: Celebrate Romanian week in England and Wales schools
attributes.additional_details: To counter the discrimination and hate speech that the UK media uses to portray Romanians
attributes.background: Promote the Romanian culture and a positive image of Romanians in UK

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about how to celebrate people of different nationalities are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
